short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Engagement Tracker for Social Media Interact with your Audience in Real Time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Talllli is an extension that let's your favorite content creators interact and respond to your "Likes, Dislikes, Shares and Comments" in real time. For example, during a livestream the host wants to talk to viewers who "Commented" & "Disliked" the current video topic, NOW DURING the SAME STREAM the host can individually identify those viewers and have them call in or otherwise directly address them LIVE! All without you doing anything different than you would do normally.

WHAT ABOUT REGULAR VIDEOS? (Non Livestreams)
Talllli works for those TOO! Content creators still see your interactions and can incorporate the feedback into their next video. Content Creators are well, "creative" and will find many ways to use Talllli and engage with their viewers in fun and inventive ways. But if YOU don't have Talllli, you CAN'T be counted! (WE LOVE PUNS!)
